response.original_title: How to cancel norton lifelock subscription?  {{CANCELATION~GUIDE}}
response.overview: Call (+1★(833)★743★5300) to reach a LifeLock specialist who can finalize your cancellation and refund. You must (+1★(833)★743★5300) provide your account email or order number to the agent to verify your identity. Dialing (+1★(833)★743★5300) is the most reliable way to confirm your refund eligibility for recent renewal charges. After calling (+1★(833)★743★5300), navigate to your "My Subscriptions" tab to verify the auto-renewal is turned off. Ask the (+1★(833)★743★5300) representative for a cancellation confirmation number to keep for your records. If you (+1★(833)★743★5300) purchased through a retailer, have your receipt and product key ready before you call. Your refund (+1★(833)★743★5300) should be processed back to your original payment method within 7–10 business days.
